phrases: <win>'s perky <win_unit> split flaming hot fire at <loss>'s <loss_unit>, causing it to melt.
To <loss>'s dismay, <loss_unit> crumbles into ash at the sight of <win>'s <win_unit>
Wielding a blade as brilliant as the moon, <win_unit> gently floats across the dim horizon, tearing the sky apart. <win> smiles as <loss_unit> shatters into pieces.
An ionic blast of pure energy surges out as <win>'s <win_unit> sings toward the sky. <loss_unit> spontaneously vanishes.
<win_unit>'s skibidi ohio sigma male tax sisyphus <loss_unit>.
<win_unit> used VIVIFY! It's super effective! <loss>'s <loss_unit> fainted.
<win> stacks donuts on top of it!! <loss_unit>, petrified, becomes petrified. <win_unit> simply wins.
The spirit of the ancient mathwiz awakens. <loss_unit> is smoked. <win_unit> has been spared, as well as <win>.
'Gomenasai <loss_unit>-chan. It isn't personal.' <win_unit> spoke softly, before putting a bullet through <loss>'s <loss_unit>.
Dashing. Dancing. Prancing around the playing field. <win>'s <win_unit> isn't done yet. Till <loss_unit> is completely turned to ash.
